price: Kuma idan wata cũta ta shãfi mutum, sai ya kira Ubangijinsa, yanã mai mai da al'amari zuwa gare Shi, sa'an nan idan Ya jũyar da cũtar da ni'ima ta daga gare Shi, sai ya manta da abin da ya kasance yanã kira zuwa gare shi a gabãnin haka, kuma ya sanya wa Allah waɗansu abõkan tarẽwa dõmin ya ɓatar (da su) daga hanyarSa. Ka ce (masa), "Ka ji dãɗi da kãfircinka, a ɗan lõkaci, lalle kai daga 'yan wutã ne."
arabic: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ضُرّٞ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مِن قَبۡلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادٗا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā massa al-insāna ḍurrun daʿā rabbahu munīban ilayhi thumma idhā khawwalahu niʿ'matan min'hu nasiya mā kāna yadʿū ilayhi min qablu wajaʿala lillahi andādan liyuḍilla ʿan sabīlihi qul tamattaʿ bikuf'rika qalīlan innaka min aṣḥābi al-nāri
